title: Solstice
description: The High Queen was dead, and Advent Mor is in the throes of being divided up piecemeal between her six children. While in the woods, not far away, a Faery in exile seeks to reclaim the throne of Aisling, which was taken from her at birth, while elsewhere, the Dragons toy with the lives of mortals.
author: Stacey Jaine McIntosh
